title: OVERSIZED 2200 SQFT!! ELEGANT 4BR FLAT @JACKSON/PRESIDIO
posting_body: ['Blocks away from the historic and beautiful Presidio Park and Lyon Street Steps (biking, hiking, running trails, tennis, golf and restaurants)!!', ' Extremely easy street parking, easy access to 280/101 and public transportation # 43 Masonic (just around the corner), #1 & # 2 to downtown, Union Square, Financial District, Ferry Building, Japantown, Presidio, Palace of Fine Arts, Marina and more.', 'Walking distance to Sacramento Street shops and restaurants (3 blocks), Laurel Heights shopping, Trader Joes, Jewish Community Center, Town School, University High, Julius Kahn Playground, Lyon Street Steps (great for neighborhood workouts), Lucas HQ, Fillmore Street and the Presidio Tunnel Tops.', 'Features:', '●\tSpacious sunny, airy downstairs flat with all the period charm and its own separate entrance, in a two-unit Georgian building, estimated 2,200 square feet.', '●\tHigh ceilings (10 ft+) throughout.', '●\tGrand and elegant living room with architectural details and lots of natural light.', '●\tFour beautiful bedrooms (two of the bedrooms overlook a lovely herb and rose garden).', ' One large bedroom with French doors and architectural details such as built-in leaded glass cabinets, box-beam ceiling.', '●\t1 ½ baths; (one bath with shower only and one bath with tub only).', '●\tOriginal, antique oak hardwood floors and fine period crown molding throughout, except bathrooms, one bedroom, kitchen and laundry room.', '●\tLarge Kitchen with brand new dishwasher and additional sizable butler pantry.', '●\tYOUR OWN LAUNDRY ROOM INSIDE UNIT (WASHER AND DRYER).', '●\tPlenty of closets (7 plus closets).', '●\tEasy street parking~ just get a permit!', 'Rent: $ 6,575/month – AVAILABLE SEPT 1, 2022', '*  UNFURNISHED flat', '*  At least one (1) year lease term, preferably 2 years', '*  Security deposit: 1.5 months ($ 9,862.50), plus first month of rent at signing', '*  Fee for credit check per applicant', '*  Owner pays garbage/ recycle/ compost services', '*  Utilities not included (separately metered electricity and gas).', 'Tenants pay own electricity/gas and all of the water in this 2-unit building and their own other expenses such as internet connections, cable tv etc.', '*  No garden, garage, or basement access and no use of fireplace', '*  Non-smokers only', '*  No pets whatsoever', '~*** Please tell us a little about yourself and all your roommates or family.', ' Also tell us your move-in date.', 'Be sure to provide your phone number(s) and email(s) and/or LinkedIn page(s).', " If you are seriously interested, we'll contact you to set-up a showing time.", '***~']
